import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import useSWR from "swr"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import Link from "next/link"; import { gql, hasuraUserClient } from "../../lib/hasura-user-client"; const getProjectsIds = gql` { Project { id Title Description } } `; const GetUsers = gql` query MyQuery { User { id Name Domain user_projects { project_id } user_projects_aggregate { aggregate { count } } } } `; const GetProjectByID = gql` query GetProjectByID($id: Int!) { Project_by_pk(id: $id) { id Title Description } } `; const assignu = gql` mutation MyMutation($project_id: Int!, $user_id: Int!) { insert_user_project_one( object: { project_id: $project_id, user_id: $user_id } ) { project_id user_id } } `; export const getStaticPaths = async () => { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { Project } = await hasura.request(getProjectsIds); return { paths: Project.map(({ id }) => ({ params: { id: id.toString(), }, })), fallback: false, }; }; export const getStaticProps = async ({ params }) => { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { id } = params; const initialData = await hasura.request(GetProjectByID, { id }); const dataU = await hasura.request(GetUsers); return { props: { initialData, dataU, }, revalidate: 1, }; }; export default function AssignP({ initialData, dataU }) { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { query } = useRouter(); const router = useRouter(); const { idP } = query; console.log(dataU.user_projects[0]); const { handleSubmit, register, control, errors, formState: { isSubmitting }, defaultValues: { ...defaultValues }, } = useForm(); const assign = async ({ id }) => { console.log(id); console.log(query.id); try { const { insert_user_project_one } = await hasura.request(assignu, { project_id: query.id, user_id: id, }); router.push(`/Project/List`); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } }; return (
